exact_quotes: I am specifically looking for a hyper honest/transparent senior engineer who fully understands the capability of Claude AI coding and is comfortable with their work being fact checked daily by another senior engineer
I need to build an MVP as quickly as possible (1-2 weeks maximum)
I am okay with sacrificing quality/perfectness to achieve my timeline but the app must be functional for at least 1000 users
pain_points: Need MVP built extremely quickly (1-2 weeks)
Timeline pressure - willing to sacrifice quality for speed
Need transparency and honesty in development process
Requires daily code reviews and standups

urgency_signals: I am looking to make my hire by end of day Wednesday
lets jump on a video call

vague_requirements.client_says: We are drawing 99% inspiration from a similar app in the market
vague_requirements.clarification_question: Which similar app are you referencing? Can you share the app name or provide wireframes?
What is the specific hourly rate range you're considering?
What does 'functional' mean specifically? Core features only, or full marketplace functionality including payments, messaging, reviews?
